sentences.en: Even at 25 Janice was tied to her parent's apron strings.
sentences.cn: 珍妮丝甚至到25岁了还受父母的控制.

sentences.en: Everyone was quiet when Janice suddenly burst out crying.
sentences.cn: 大家都没出声,珍妮丝忽然哇地一声哭了起来.

sentences.en: He looked over at Janice, who was watching him with an apprehensive frown.
sentences.cn: 他的目光落在了Janice身上, 她正在不安的皱着眉看着他.

sentences.en: Is that true, or are you just getting over Janice by groping my sister?
sentences.cn: 这是实话?还是你泡我妹妹只是为了忘记珍妮丝?

sentences.en: Janice : Oh , I miss you already. Can you believe this happened?
sentences.cn: 哦, 我已经开始想你了. 你能相信竟然发生这种事情 吗 ?

sentences.en: Janice : Yeah. In fact, I have an interview next Monday.
sentences.cn: 贾尼斯: 有啊, 我下周一就有个面试.

sentences.en: Janice looked relieved and Harry felt annoyed with her.
sentences.cn: Janice看起来松了一口气,而这让Harry觉得很心烦.

sentences.en: Janice sat up talking with Byron long after Aster left.
sentences.cn: 埃斯特走后,杰妮丝和拜伦促膝长谈.

sentences.en: Janice was cross with Jeff for being late for the date.
sentences.cn: 珍尼丝因为杰夫约会迟到而不高兴.

sentences.en: Janice: I know, but I'm just not sure yet.
sentences.cn: 我知道, 但是我就是还不能确定.

sentences.en: Janice: Indiscretion? How can an indiscretion last two months?
sentences.cn: 言行失检? 言行失检怎么能持续两个月?

sentences.en: Janice: Will, Tom. Good to see you this morning.
sentences.cn: 珍妮丝: 威尔 、 汤姆, 早啊.

sentences.en: Just don't waste any more energy feeling guilty about Janice.
sentences.cn: 不过别再白花精力觉得自己对不住贾妮丝了.

sentences.en: Monica: Yeah, but Janice? That - that was like the worst breakup in history!
sentences.cn: 莫妮卡: 好吧, 可是珍妮琵? 你们的分手是历史上最糟糕的分手!

sentences.en: Rhoda's willowy figure, modish straw hat, and fuchsia gloves and shoes surprised Janice.
sentences.cn: 罗达的苗条身材, 时髦的草帽, 紫红色的手套和鞋使杰妮丝有些惊讶.

trans.tran_cn: 珍妮丝（女子名，涵义：少女）
